name: Westin Gurgaon, New Delhi

reviews.text: A very good hotel with good service. The restaurants are amazing. Really good food and very varied and great taste. Great place for business stay but out of town - can take over 3 hours on a bad day to get into Delhi city. Really enjoyed my stay there, the staff realize that location wise they are out of town but make it up with the service provided.
reviews.title: Out of town but a great place for business in the Gurgaon area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel:New Construction
reviews.title: Good modern hotel

reviews.text: Rooms:Modern minimalist decor
reviews.title: Away from Trafic

reviews.text: Food:Amongst the best in Delhi and NCR region.Seasonal tastes serves excellent breakfast and Eest has the best Chinese.Prego serves excellent Italian and is fun dining with kids.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: Service:Personal and very efficient
reviews.title: Good business hotel

reviews.text: Well we had dinner at the cafe went in a huge group
reviews.title: Resurant Review

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service food all ok and good
reviews.title: A luxury experience

reviews.text: Need more variety and also service levels need to be more classy thats all.
reviews.title: Delightful Stay

reviews.text: The area in the hotel was clean yet again very overdone in places
reviews.title: Sigh of joy

reviews.text: I would def like to see if after my review the cafe and service there improves and does the head there really believe in customer review and improving things.Didnt get a chance to note down the names of the staff i interacted with otherwise would have been more specific.
reviews.title: Westin is amazing, but even more so in Delhi

reviews.text: Stayed here for business and was not disappointed. Arrived late in the evening at the airport, and my hotel car was waiting for me complete with ice cold water! Very comfortable journey to the hotel and friendly staff checked me in. The hotel is relatively new so the decor is modern and tasteful, and the hotel is very well maintained, clean and comfortable. I only had breakfast and lunch in the hotel but both were of a very high standard. Very fast and reliable internet access which made work easy. Would definitely stay here again if I am visiting New Delhi in future.
reviews.title: Great modern hotel in Gurgaon

reviews.text: Amazing service was there with my family relaxing at the pool. Great spa, food , especially Prego n east, mix could be more lively , but overall staff quick n friendly, executive club out of this world, best among all Weston's keep it up
reviews.title: Best hotel in gurgaon

reviews.text: This hotel is really very nice. The hotel staff (especially at breakfast, the pool attendant and one of the transport staff) were absolutely great. Food is high quality, as is cleanliness and quality of facilities. I will be back!
reviews.title: Very good hotel for business stay

reviews.text: I spent a night here, while on a business trip. the check in and check out process was quick and smooth. Friendly and professional staff. The architecture inspires a sense of space and adequate privacy. Rooms are well appointed with a lot of room, high ceiling and good furnishing - a comfy bed and right type of pillows are must for me. Breakfast was a huge spread spanning Japanese, Chinese, Indian, Continental. Most interesting here was the possibility to have a real honey comb (without battling the bees! ).
reviews.title: Great place to stay
five star
reviews.text: On the improvement side, I had a room facing the main road, and the sound insulation was quite poor, as a consequence I had to put up with the noise of traffic and street celebrations well past 0130hrs in the morning, before I could get a peaceful sleep.

Classic Westin experience. Great property. Good facilities. Great rooms and high speed internet. Only issue is that the property has no place to go to or walk to nearby. Well, that us probably typical of Gurgaon, in general.
reviews.title: Classic Westin

reviews.text: I have been traveling to India on business for the 15 years. Nice hotels(limited) were always so very expensive in the years past. Recently, with the influx of many new hotels, you are able to get decent prices at nice places. The Westin in Gurgaon is one of these places. The hotel is close enough to the Airport and around the business center. The hotel is quite grand, and I always enjoy peeking into the functions that held there almost every night. Midweek weddings are a great spectacle to view and you are assured to find one of these during the stay. The hotel is not an oasis, but it's a very nice hotel for the value. Only one blemish was the service at their basic restaurants for dinner. The service was very slow and the wait staff seemed confused. There were Indian families that were visibly upset at the service. The waiters couldn't get the menus over to quite a few tables and this inlcudes me. The breakfast is solid and a must do at any of the Indian Hotels. The Masala Dosa is quite good for a N. Indian place.
reviews.title: Perfect Location and Value

reviews.text: The Westin, Gurgaon never fails to amaze me every time I stay there. The moment I step in to the reception, the people who meet me there always have a smile on their faces making me feel so welcome. My stay was short this time, but I managed to eat at the EEST. Personally I feel this was one of the best Oriental meals I have had in a long time. Right from the salad to the Thai Green curry, everything was mouth watering delicious. For dinner I ate the buffet spread at the Seasons restaurant. The spread brilliant. I had a really good meal before I finally crashed on the heavenly bed, which I must say keeps to it's name. Although it was a short visit it was very relaxing and as always I had a great time.
reviews.title: The perfect place to stay in Gurgaon

reviews.text: We went there for a Sunday brunch. The selection and quality food was amazing. I was surprised to see the quality of salmon they served in the buffet. All in all it was a very good brunch with friends, will go back there for sure.
reviews.title: Very good food!!!

reviews.text: Very well appointed rooms which are spacious and have an excellent decor. A good business hotel with a very central location in Gurgaon. The food in the restaurants in also great. Overall a good experience staying at the hotel.
reviews.title: Great business hotel with spacious rooms

aka: Westin Gurgaon, New Delhi Hotel Gurgaon
description: Access to Business and LeisureLocated on the National Highway in the city's growing business and entertainment district, just 15 minutes from Delhi's Indira Gandhi Airport, we're a short walk from multiple malls and the metro for quick service into Delhi.Health and Enjoyment AboundRenew at the Heavenly Spa by Westin™, recharge in the WestinWORKOUT® Gym or indulge in a refreshing dip in our outdoor pool. A journey of culinary delights awaits in our seven restaurants and bars serving authentic Asian, European, and Indian offerings.Chic Heavenly RetreatsOur 313 spacious guest rooms and suites are decadent sanctuaries with Westin Heavenly Beds®, rainforest showers and more. Two exclusive Westin Executive Club floors provide access to our duplex Club Lounge with panoramic views of Millennium City.
